New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander passed Gary Payton for the second most games in franchise history with 30+ points on 70%+ shooting, behind Kevin Durant's 14 games
Key Match Events: Thunder 126, Knicks 101: Sparked by a 30-9 run spanning the 1st and 2nd quarters and a combined 70 points from Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (39 pts, 71.4% FG) and Isaiah Joe (31 pts, career-high 8 3pm)
Isaiah Hartenstein received a warm reception in his return to MSG, before finishing with six points, nine boards, six dimes, two steals and two blocks
